title: When Riot Takes Away Your Play Button You Know You've Played Too Much
body:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/pyquhljkvzf6gxy/Play%20Buttons%20Gone.jpg?dl=0 
So yea... my play buttons gone. Guess it's time to go to sleep zzzZZZ



Night Peeps,
Fellow Summoner

replies.body: I think I'm in a slightly better boat, I can see my play button but I can't click on it...

Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?
